node.name: Dry & Wet Vacuum Cleaner MAKE: PRESTIGE MODEL: TYPHOON 07
node.description: Powerful suction with attached chair like castor wheel for movement and dump capacity for both dry and wet dust. Spring coiled hose can extend to length of 1.5 meter and reverse blower mechanism helps to collect micro size of dust while maximum size of particle that can intake is of 30mm. Energy efficient with 2 stars on power consumption rating and produce 65dB of noise. (SIZE: 270x200x310mm / WEIGHT: 6 Kg / POWER: 1200 watts)
node.content: Another Indian Brand from Bangalore, well known for Kitchen cookware came up with this multi-use Vacuum Cleaner which has purpose to serve cleaning in rooms and kitchen as well / With low cost peripheral bypass motor that has maximum speed of 20000 RPM(Rotation Per Minute) and 360 degree moving castor wheel, user can drag and move it to any part of home without lifting / It is used on both type of surface i.e. wet & dry and bucket has capacity of 18 litre / Other cleaning accessories like floor brush, absorbing brush, crevice tool, corner brush and extension tube or extension hose are also provided along with the Vacuum cleaner so that every narrow corner can be covered while cleaning / With 1200 watts of power consumption it consume 300 to 500 rupees of electricity at monthly basis on average timing of 1 to 1.5 hours of working in both dry and wet surface / Manufacturer also provide 1 year of warranty which is hardly seen over Vacuum cleaner at window shopping.
node.alt: Prestige Clean Home Wet and Dry Vacuum Cleaner - Typhoon 07

node.name: Powerful Vacuum Cleaner MAKE: BLACK+DECKER MODEL: GW3030-GB
node.description: Cleaner cum shredder for both indoor and outdoor purpose that has capacity bag for 40 litres at a single time. Made with light weight components which provide stability while working and make it manageable to carry over shoulder at high blower speed of 310Km/h. Not so much energy efficient and produce 90dB of noise. (SIZE: 525x400x265mm / WEIGHT: 4.8 Kg / POWER: 3000 watts)
node.content: Like an American  way, this american origin machine has a dual function for cleaning i.e. suction for garbage which also get shredded inside machine and blower for long staying dust / 3000 watts motor has a capacity for continue run time of 5 hours without getting  heat up and can produce the air blowing speed of 310 Km per hour / With approximate weight of 8 Kg this machine is not for the children use, also the dump bag capacity is of 40 litre which is designed for adult purpose / Used for any type of garden debris except the items of steel and wood logs of size more than 50mm / With 12 meter of inbuilt extension cable user can perform its blower ability on car wash / This is heavy duty cleaning machine and can be subjected to 90% of cleaning work on wet and dry debris or dust, also manufacturer provide the warranty of 1 year.
node.alt: BLACK+DECKER GW3030-GB Variable Speed 3000-Watt Powerful Blower and Suction Vacuum Cleaner with Shredder and 40L Bag for Home and Outdoors(Red)

node.name: Vacuum Cleaner MAKE: EUREKA FORBES MODEL: Trendy Zip
node.description: Portable, light weighted, a perfect assistant for home cleaning by the reputed Indian Brand. Capability to drag on wheel and suction duct of 2-meter cord length that can intake dirt particles of diameter not more than 30mm. Energy efficient with 3 stars on power consumption rating and produce 50dB of noise. (SIZE: 300x210x185mm / WEIGHT: 2.5 Kg / POWER: 1000 watts)
node.content: Eureka Forbes a brand from Shapoorji Pallonji group always tried to re-invent the daily working of Indian home towards easiness and more effective / This Vacuum cleaner concealed with weed trimmer motor that can go up to 10000 RPM(Rotation Per Minute) / Light weight plastic is used for the design of container that can store 1 Kg of dump at single time of use / With 1000 watts of power consumption if this Vacuum cleaner would be run for 10 minutes a day for cleaning than for the month it will cost the 150 rupees which is quiet less as compare to average maid salary / 2-meter cord length helps to target the maximum area while standing at single place in a room and also approach height is 1 meter which is enough as compare to any manual broom / As per manufacturer guidelines it must subjected to dry cleaning only and there are many indicators which are helpful in controlling the work manoeuvre.
node.alt: Eureka Forbes Trendy Zip 1000-Watt Vacuum Cleaner (Black/Red)

node.name: Dry Vacuum Cleaner MAKE: PHILIPS MODEL: FC9352/01
node.description: With 2 wheels drag for movement and advance cycle-5 technology for separation of micro dust from air this Vacuum cleaner has ability to swallow even stain of loose crayon colors. Spring coiled hose provide the action radius of 9 meter which is largest as per domestic appliance standard. Energy efficient with 4 stars on power consumption rating and produce 82dB of noise. (SIZE: 410x280x250mm / WEIGHT: 4.5 Kg / POWER: 1900 watts)
node.content: European brand from Netherlands which is committed to bring high standards in electrical appliances especially technicality with workability / Strong suction that has airflow of 37 litre per second can scrub the difficult stain like marks of crayon color which is done by small children / 1900 watts tangential bypass motor produce the 20000 RPM(Rotation Per Minute) which in average cost the monthly bill of 300 to 500 rupee at 1 to 1.5 hour of daily use / With 6 meter of cord length and 3 meter of duct extension, this Vacuum cleaner has action radius of 9 meter which means from the point of A/C connection user can go up to distance of 9 meter for cleaning of dust / Accessories like turbo brush can easily draw more hairs and dust / Self-weight is around 4.5 Kg and bagless design enables to store near by the same quantity / Manufacturer also provide 2 year of warranty which is hardly seen over Vacuum cleaner at window shopping.
node.alt: Philips PowerPro FC9352/01 Compact Bagless Vacuum Cleaner (Blue)

strapiProduct.description: With 2 wheels drag for movement and advance cycle-5 technology for separation of micro dust from air this Vacuum cleaner has ability to swallow even stain of loose crayon colors. Spring coiled hose provide the action radius of 9 meter which is largest as per domestic appliance standard. Energy efficient with 4 stars on power consumption rating and produce 82dB of noise. (SIZE: 410x280x250mm / WEIGHT: 4.5 Kg / POWER: 1900 watts)
